withdrawFrom(address,uint256).intent: Unwrap WNAT from another user into native tokens

delegate(address,uint256).intent: Delegate all governance vote power to address

votePowerOfAt(address,uint256).intent: Get the governance vote power of an address at block number

batchDelegate(address[],uint256[]).intent: Delegate governance to list of Delegatees

balanceOf(address).intent: Check the amount of tokens an account owns

allowance(address,address).intent: Show how many tokens a spender is still allowed to use from the owner's account

approve(address,uint256).intent: Let someone spend a set amount of your tokens

claim(address,address,uint256,bool).intent: Claim rewards on someones behalf (with their approval), and send them to a specific address

autoClaim(address[],uint256).intent: Claim and wrap rewards for multiple accounts (if you're allowed)

nextClaimableMonth(address).intent: View the next month this address can claim rewards for

getClaimableAmount(uint256).intent: Check how much you can claim for a specific month

getClaimableAmountOf(address,uint256).intent: Check how much an address can claim for a specific month

setClaimExecutors(address[]).intent: Choose whos allowed to claim your rewards on your behalf. This replaces any previous choices.

setAllowedClaimRecipients(address[]).intent: Choose which addresses can receive your rewards when someone claims on your behalf. This replaces any previous list.

getStateOfRewards(address).intent: View the total rewards and how much has already been claimed for a specific address

claimExecutors(address).intent: Check the list of addresses allowed to call `claim` for a reward owner and the list of allowed claim recipients for that reward owner.

autoClaim(address[],uint24,(bytes32[],(u.intent: Claim rewards for multiple reward owners and their associated accounts, and deposit them to the WNAT

noOfInitialisedWeightBasedClaims(uint256.intent: Return the number of weight based claims that have been initialized

getStateOfRewardsAt(address,uint24).intent: Get the reward states for a given address at a specific reward epoch

getUnclaimedRewardState(address,uint24,u.intent: Get the unclaimed reward state for a beneficiary, reward epoch, and claim type
